name: Mathematics Secondary 4
description: Covers Complex Numbers, Measurement and Trigonometry, Inequalities and Vectors, Calculus, and related topics following South Sudan curriculum.

name: Chemistry Secondary 4
description: Covers Identification of Ions and Gases, Energy Changes, Chemical Kinetics, Equilibrium, Electrochemistry, Extraction of Metals, Analytical Techniques, Organic and Nuclear Chemistry.

name: English Secondary 4
description: Focus on Gender Issues, Transport, Corruption, Communication Technology, Culture, Democracy, and Justice with reading comprehension and language skills.
